statements: DELETE FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
DELETE FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE animal_id = 100 AND gps_sensor_id = 5;
DELETE FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
DELETE FROM sensor_status WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND battery_level < 20;
DELETE FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE animal_name = 'Elephant' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM wildlife_locations WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND deployed_date > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM wildlife_locations WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND animal_id = 201;
DELETE FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE end_timestamp < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
